definition: variant of 餘暉|余晖[yu2 hui1]
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me

sentences.english: The study in my thesis focuses on the GRB afterglows.
sentences.chinese: 本论文的研究集中在伽玛暴的余辉方面。

sentences.english: Sunrise in the east, I reached a block that touch of persistence.
sentences.chinese: 日出东升，我伸手是遮挡那一抹余辉。

sentences.english: And I should pray for the glory of a colorful sunset.
sentences.chinese: 而我也将为能够看到绚丽多彩的落日余辉而祈祷。

sentences.english: The remaining of thousand years flutters those blooming flower seasons, floating to fall those raining seasons.
sentences.chinese: 千年的余辉摇曳那些花季，飘落那些雨季。

sentences.english: The sun was setting, spilling golden lights on the low western hills.
sentences.chinese: 夕阳西下，把金色余辉洒在矮矮的西山上。

sentences.english: Faint afterglow, sun reflected the red river.
sentences.chinese: 晕晕余辉，残阳映红了江水。

sentences.english: No more encore except for the afterglow.
sentences.chinese: 再无需加演，因为有余辉。

sentences.english: Nightfall, the harbour lights gradually, the horizon a daisy afterglow.
sentences.chinese: 夜幕初临，维港灯火渐明，天边一抹紫霞余辉。

sentences.english: Moreover, the influences of the valence change tendency of rare earth elements for the afterglow performance were summarized.
sentences.chinese: 总结了激活离子变价倾向对余辉性能的影响。

sentences.english: The brightening mechanism and the relation between phosphorescence afterglow and the temperature are described in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了磷光体的发光机理以及磷光余辉与温度的关系。

sentences.english: The last ray of the sun had already faded from the cloud-edges.
sentences.chinese: 太阳的余辉已经渐次消失在云端里。
我们为落日的余辉而激动。

sentences.english: In the rays of the setting sun we sat on the rocks in the stream, washing clothes.
sentences.chinese: 在落日的余辉下，我们坐在溪中岩石上洗衣服。

sentences.english: That noise turned out to be the cosmic microwave background, the afterglow of the big bang fireball.
sentences.chinese: 这一噪音最终被证实是宇宙背景微波，大爆炸的余辉。

sentences.english: Setting sun rays, reflected the rosy clouds, meet the breeze, toward the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 落日余辉，映着彩霞，迎着微风，向着天际。

definition: the sun sets in the west (idiom)
multicolored sunlight of sunrise or sunset
first rays of morning sun/first glimmer of dawn
